item.title: Rose add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Rose add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Rose add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Rose add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rose add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Rose add a quote by Charles Schultz
item.description: "<b>I</b> love mankind ... it's <b>people</b> I can't stand!!" -- Charles Schultz

item.title: Rose add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Rose add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Happiness is a warm puppy." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Rose add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Rose add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Oh well... I'd just been thinking, if you had died, you'd have been welcome to share my toilet." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Rose add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Rose add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Rose add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Rose add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Rose add a quote by Anne Frank
item.description: "Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy." -- Anne Frank

item.title: Rose add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "The truth." Dumbledore sighed. "It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Rose add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Wit beyond measure is a man's greatest treasure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Rose add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Just because you have the emotional range of a teaspoon doesn't mean we all have." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Rose add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin

item.title: Rose add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Rose add a quote by Scott Westerfeld
item.description: "What you do, the way you think, makes you beautiful." -- Scott Westerfeld

item.title: Rose add a quote by Scott Westerfeld
Rose add a quote by Scott Westerfeld
item.description: "Never bored on a hoverboard." -- Scott Westerfeld

item.title: Rose add a quote by Scott Westerfeld
item.description: "That Shay was in possesion of hand grenades was a comforting thought showed what kind of night this had become." -- Scott Westerfeld
